Package ezxpns.data.records

Interface Summary
CategoryHandler<T extends Record> Interface to handle the categories between the Graphical User Interface and the data storage (upon GUI Exit)
PaymentHandler Interface to handle the payment modes between the Graphical User Interface and the data storage (upon GUI Exit)
RecordHandler To handle the records between the Graphical User Interface and the data storage (upon GUI Exit)
 

Class Summary
Category An immutable class to represent the current category
meant to be used in Record as a reference
ExpenseRecord Record with two additional attribute: expenseType{NEED, WANT} and PaymentMethod
ExpenseRecordManager A special record manager for expense records, since we need to store all payment methods for it
To be refactor soon
IncomeRecord A Record object that specifically stores income details
PaymentMethod A category-like class that stores payment method
Record A container for some basic record attributes
RecordManager<T extends Record> A java Generic to manage records
 

Enum Summary
ExpenseType  
 

Exception Summary
RecordManager.CategoryUpdateException  
RecordManager.RecordUpdateException
